WP Engine | Austin, TX and Limerick, Ireland | ONSITE Full-time

WP Engine is building a high-scale managed cloud platform for WordPress. We have solid and growing revenue with 70,000+ customers and 500,000+ sites.

Our current tech stack is primarily Python & Go, running on GCP & AWS. We have opportunities to work on our container-based hosting platform, our service layer, or our UI and developer tools. This is a great place to grow your career.

Apply at https://wpengine-careers.com/job-openings/ or email me questions at michael.smith[at]wpengine.com
